1370: Eligius moved to Die Camp.A.5 after marriage.
Got married to Siburgis at age 28 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Siburgis, Dilane, at age 29.
1372: Had a son with Siburgis, Hugheman, at age 30.
1376: Had a son with Siburgis, Snelle, at age 34.
1378: Had a son with Siburgis, Rembrandus, at age 36.
1379: Had a son with Siburgis, Jonas, at age 37.
1380: Lost son Rembrandus when Rembrandus was 3 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Tetta, at age 39.
1383: Had a son with Siburgis, Segher, at age 41.
1386: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Hodine, at age 44.
Lost daughter Hodine when Hodine was 1 years old.
1387: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Beatrice, at age 45.
1389: Had a son with Siburgis, Heideric, at age 47.
